name: Traveller's Gloom
description:
The game takes place in a post-apocalyptic scenario , where a young woman Sophie is leading a life a solitude in a remote little Shopping center after having split up with her companions for reasons.

All seems to be at peace, well except the world ending apocalypse looming over everyone's head, but then... Sophie realizes that something is off. Something doesn't feel quiet right.

Follow Sophie as she digs deep within herself in order to relive a past that she had buried .

Trigger Warning:

The game deals with heavy topics which might not be tolerable for some.

Please proceed at your own discretion.

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

E to interact with objects
